text: Novocheboksarsk (; , Śĕnĕ Šupaškar) is a city in the Chuvash Republic, Russia. It is located on the southern bank of the Volga River. It is a satellite city of Cheboksary, the capital of Chuvashia. == History == Novocheboksarsk was founded in 1960 and was given city status in 1971. == Twin towns and sister cities == Novocheboksarsk is twinned with: * Klimovsk, Russia * Sterlitamak, Russia * Žatec, Czech Republic ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Chuvashia
title: Novocheboksarsk
